mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.opernIndex, B.opernTitle, B.opernImg, B.opernOSSImg FROM (SELECT * FROM tbl_operninfo ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT #{0}, #{1}) A INNER JOIN tbl_opernimginfo B ON A.id = B.opernId ORDER BY A.views DESC, B.opernIndex ASC

SELECT A.*, B.opernIndex, B.opernTitle, B.opernImg, B.opernOSSImg from (SELECT * FROM tbl_operninfo WHERE title LIKE #{patten} OR songAuthor LIKE #{patten} OR wordAuthor LIKE #{patten} OR singer LIKE #{patten} ORDER BY views DESC LIMIT 50) A inner join tbl_opernimginfo B ON A.id = B.opernId ORDER BY A.views DESC , B.opernIndex ASC

SELECT A.*, B.opernIndex, B.opernTitle, B.opernImg, B.opernOSSImg FROM (SELECT * FROM tbl_operninfo o WHERE o.html in (SELECT htmlUrl from tbl_operntempinfo ot WHERE ot.deleteflage = '0') and o.deleteFlage = '0' ORDER BY views DESC ) A INNER JOIN tbl_opernimginfo B ON A.id = B.opernId ORDER BY A.views DESC, B.opernIndex ASC
